item.title: [HRI2020 Paper Accepted!] on Transposing CoWriter to Learning the New Kazakh Alphabet
Best Reviewer Award for ICCE
item.description:
I am hounoured that the 27th International Conference on Computers in Education awarded me with the Best Reviewer Award.

http://ilt.nutn.edu.tw/icce2019/04_Best%20Reviewer%20Award.html

item.title: 4 Full Papers Presented @RoMan 2019, New Delhi!
item.description: I was very glad to meet my colleagues and friends at RoMan. We presented four papers and enjoyed a day off in Jaipur.

item.title: Paper accepted! Allohaptic
item.description: I was very glad to meet my colleagues and friends virtually at RoMan2020.

item.title: The iReCheck project accepted!
item.description: The iReCheck project submitted last April will be funded by the French ANR and the Swiss NSF. The goal of the project is to explore the learning by teaching sceanrio proposed in the cowriter project in with both performance and social adaptation, and with TD learners and learners with NDD. The project brings educational expertise of the EPFL team with the NDD expertise of the French partners to build a system that can suit all types of learners.

item.title: First day at UNSW as Lecturer (Assistant Prof)
item.description: Officially starting at @UNSWEngineering today. Looking forward to this exciting adventure! Stay tuned, Phd job offers coming soon.

item.title: Demos at NCCR Robotics Industry Days
item.description: The CHILI Lab presented several demo at the Swiss Converntion Center. Always a great opportunity to meet with colleagues from the NCCR and robotics actor of the reagion.
